page.title: 20THE DOMESDAY PROJECT TEAM
page.content: The research team representing the {Crawley Down Afternoon Women's {Institute}are{Miss Violet Emy, Mrs {Ruth Beattie}and{Mrs Mary Becker. Miss Emy, born in Croydon, Surrey, is a retired Headmistress of a local Primary School. Mrs Beattie, born in Cambridge, worked for the wartime RAF before becoming a housewife and mother. Mrs Becker, born in East Grinstead, taught Junior children before becoming a farmer's wife and a mother. Our common interest in our heritage led us to take up this challenge which we have enjoyed immensely. Although having lived in Crawley Down for many years, we had not realised the potential interest in the area which we have studied in detail.
